original_title: Slade: The Very Best of Slade
overview: Featuring classic promo videos and rare TV performances, available for the first time on DVD. The Wall of Hits Video compilation features a commentary from Noddy Holder, Jim Lea, Dave Hill and Don Powell.  1 > WALL OF HITS  2 > SET OF SIX  3 > MORE HITS
title: Slade: The Very Best of Slade
